Though Jim Wallace would be a heavy underdog, he sounded like someone who already has identified a potential Mike Pence weakness: the six-term congressman has no executive experience. Possessing the track record of successful business and executive leadership is fundamental to delivering on the promise for Indiana citizens, Jim Wallace said in the letter. Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said, "The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't." Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments

is just the front end of a back-to-back that concludes with a trip to see the Phoenix Suns Thursday night before All-Star Weekend. "Great team effort," Dirk Nowitzki said after Saturday night's win. And then, hopefully, go on the break feeling good about ourselves and come back and make a heck of a run in the second half of the season.
